description: Number of elements in Z[ sqrt(-2) ] whose `smallest algorithm' is <= n.
comments: No recurrence is known.a(n) = upper left and lower right terms of the 2 X 2 matrix [1,-2; 2,1]^n. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 28 2008
references: P. Samuel, About Euclidean rings, J. Alg., 19 (1971), 282-301.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: H. W. Lenstra, Jr.
